DESCRIPTION: Add a reaction to a reaction role on your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}reactionroleadd [Name] [Emoji Name] [@Role | Role ID | Role Name]** ~ Adds the Emoji to the reaction role with the provided name and sets the roles to be used for this reaction.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: The reaction role that you are trying to add the reaction to must already have been created with the {{prefix}}reactionrolecreate command.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: The **[Emoji Name]** must be an emoji that you created using the *{{prefix}}emojicreate* command.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: Note: The bot must have a role higher than the role you are trying to save in the database.
NOT_FOUND: There was no reaction role found with the name: **{{name}}**
UPDATED: The **{{name}}** reaction role has been updated.
